title: In Step Out of Step IV
marks: Signature, Title, Date, Inscription, Edition and C See Inscription
description: two sheets attached together in vertical format; top sheet has green and orange ground with blue, orange and yellow looping shapes in linear format and two grey organic solid shapes; bottom sheet had mottled purple ground with linear looped coils in white and cone-shaped purple linear cage-like design
creditline: Gift of the artist in memory of Shelly Ross
